```{r data cleaning}
# Import results
res = read.csv("Proteomics/Reports/DCCT EDIC CARV.csv",na.strings = "")
# Convert names to Entrez ID
names_symbol = bitr(sub(";.*","",names$symbol),fromType = "SYMBOL",
            toType = "ENTREZID",OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db)
colnames(names_symbol) = c("symbol","entrez1")
names_uniprot = bitr(sub(";.*","",res$protid),fromType = "UNIPROT",
            toType = "ENTREZID",OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db)
colnames(names_uniprot) = c("protid","entrez2")
res = left_join(res,names_symbol,relationship = "many-to-many")
# GSEA
y <- gsePathway(unadjusted, 
                pvalueCutoff = 1,
                pAdjustMethod = "BH", 
                verbose = FALSE)
```
